data.title: Highlights from Strata NY '19
data.description: Experts explore new trends, tools, and techniques in data and machine learning.

data.title: Using Amazon Polly in Windows Applications
data.description: AWS offers a vast array of services that allow developers to build applications in the cloud. At the same time, Windows desktop applications can take advantage of these services as well. Today, we are releasing Amazon Polly for Windows, an open-source engine that allows users to take advantage of Amazon Polly voices in SAPI-compliant Windows […]

data.title: Introducing “PocketML” – an Experiential Learning Platform for Data Science
data.description: Do we need to change the way we learn? Before you read any further, here is a sneak peak of our new experiential learning product – PocketML.   What is PocketML? After hosting thousands of offline trainings, writing blogs on a variety of topics and designing online training, we have realized 3 ingredients that differentiate […]

data.title: Sample Efficient Evolutionary Algorithm for Analog Circuit Design
data.description: The BAIR Blog

data.title: Delivering the enterprise data cloud
data.description: Arun Murthy introduces the open source Cloudera Data Platform (CDP).

data.title: Data Science Pioneers: Conquering the next frontier, a documentary investigating the future of data science
data.description: Jed Dougherty presents the trailer of the upcoming Data Science Pioneers documentary.

data.title: Postrevolutionary big data: Promoting the general welfare
data.description: Barbara Eckman shares lessons learned from early big data mistakes and the progress her team at Comcast is making toward a big data vision.

data.title: Say what? The ethical challenges of designing for humanlike interaction
data.description: Jonathan Foster explains why language reveals ethical challenges we couldn’t encounter with GUI-powered experiences.

data.title: RL in real life: Bringing reinforcement learning to the enterprise
data.description: Edward Jezierski discusses the ways reinforcement learning is used across Microsoft.

data.title: Staying safe in the AI era
data.description: Cassie Kozyrkov offers actionable advice for taking advantage of machine learning, navigating the AI era, and staying safe as you innovate.

data.title: Strata Data Awards winners 2019
data.description: The Strata Data Awards recognize the most innovative startups, leaders, and data science projects from Strata sponsors and exhibitors.

data.title: Data sonification: Making music from the yield curve
data.description: Alan Smith says combining visualization and sonification could take the presentation of data into the expanding universe of screenless devices and products.

data.title: Unlocking the value of your data
data.description: Daniel Hernandez looks at how a unified, prescriptive information architecture can help organizations unlock the value of their data.

data.title: Machine learning and analytics for time series data
data.description: The O’Reilly Data Show Podcast: Arun Kejariwal and Ira Cohen on building large-scale, real-time solutions for anomaly detection and forecasting.

data.title: Demystifying BERT: A Comprehensive Guide to the Groundbreaking NLP Framework
data.tags: Advanced, Classification, NLP, Python, Supervised, Technique, Text, Unstructured Data
data.description: BERT is the powerful and game-changing NLP framework from Google. In this article learn what is BERT and use of BERT for text classification in python.

data.title: A Gentle Introduction to Probability Density Estimation
data.description: Probability density is the relationship between observations and their probability. Some outcomes of a random variable will have low probability density and other outcomes will have a high probability density. The overall shape of the probability density is referred to as a probability distribution, and the calculation of probabilities for specific outcomes of a random […]

data.title: What is the Infrastructure Phase of Machine Learning?
The future of Google Cloud data processing
data.description: James Malone introduces new Google Cloud capabilities that help data professionals build scalable and flexible applications faster.

data.title: Interactive sports analytics
data.description: Patrick Lucey explains methods to find play similarity using multi-agent trajectory data, as well as predicting fine-grain plays.

data.title: AI isn’t magic. It’s computer science.
data.description: Rob Thomas and Tim O’Reilly discuss the hard work and mass experimentation that will lead to AI breakthroughs.

data.title: How disruptive tech is reshaping the financial services industry
data.description: Swatee Singh looks at how the financial services industry is using AI, ML, mixed reality and other technologies.

data.title: Recent trends in data and ML
data.description: Ben Lorica dives into emerging technologies for building data infrastructures and machine learning platforms.

data.title: Unleash the power of data at scale
data.description: Jeremy Rader explores Intel’s end-to-end data pipeline software strategy.

data.title: Everything is connected and the clock is ticking
data.description: Sara Menker and Nemo Semret outline the complex and interconnected factors that shape the agriculture industry.

data.title: Cisco Data Intelligence Platform
data.description: Siva Sivakumar explains how the Cisco Data Intelligence Platform brings together data, AI, compute, and storage.

data.title: Contributing Data to Deepfake Detection Research

data.description: All you wanted to know about TensorFlow 2.0, Swift for TensorFlow and other TF products. An insightful podcast with Google TensorFlow's Paige Bailey.

data.title: rlpyt: A Research Code Base for Deep Reinforcement Learning in PyTorch
data.description: The BAIR Blog

data.title: How to construct the optimal neural architecture for your machine learning task
data.description: By reframing the problem of function approximation, a new analysis suggests ways to optimize neural architectures.

data.title: How Search Engines like Google Retrieve Results: Introduction to Information Extraction using Python and spaCy
data.tags: Beginner, Data Mining, NLP, Python, Technique, Text, Unstructured Data
data.description: An introduction to information extraction. In this article learn about information extraction using python and spacy with Python code.
